    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task(int id,
            java.lang.String description,
            int projectId,
            java.time.LocalDate startDate,
            java.time.LocalDate endDate,
            boolean isDone)
        Task constructor
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the task
        description - the description of the task
        projectId - the id of the project the task is assigned to
        startDate - the start date of a task, initially on the start date of a project
        endDate - the end date of the task, initially on the end date of project
        isDone - true if the task has been completed else false

      • Task

            int projectId,

            boolean isDone)
        Task constructor without id
        Parameters:
        description - the description of the task
        projectId - the id of the project the task is assigned to
        startDate - the start date of a task, initially on the start date of a project
        endDate - the end date of the task, initially on the end date of project
        isDone - true if the task has been completed else false
